settings.title: The World's Okay-est Merch
settings.description: Celebrate the art of being wonderfully average with French Roast, where the jokes are just alright and the clothes are also fine.

settings.title: About Jaime
settings.description: French Roast is the brainchild of multi-talented comedian Jaime French. When she’s not making merch that’s just adequate, she’s brewing up comedy skits and movie reviews with a humor dryer than your morning espresso. So grab a cup of French Roast and take a scroll through the marvelously uneventful world of Jaime.
